alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Warren (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Warren and southeastern Taliaferro Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Barnett to Camak, and moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Warrenton, Norwood, Sharon, Camak, Cadley, Barnett, Mesena, and Raytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
